item.description:
Many members have suggested joining forces with our sister travel club in Boston.

They meet every second Wednesday and always have 50 to 60 people attend each time.

If you fancy a night out in Boston to meet up with some great fellow travel enthusiasts (who are very fun as well), come and join along.

It doesn't matter whether you are a solo traveler, a couple or just friends; everyone is welcome.

We meet at the high tables at the back of the Rattlesnake Bar on Boylston Street. If you are looking to car pool, drop a request/invite on the discussion board.

Email if you have any questions. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: High tables at the back - Look for Jeff and Kevin with a bright yellow hat.
item.name: NH/Seacoast International Adventure Travel Club April Meetup
